overview: Bill Elliott stops the evil cattle rustlers, who use up sheriffs like disposable razor blades. Instead of the customary gun battles, Elliott was known for his fisticuffs action and so he uses his knuckles to clean out the bad guys and win the heart of Iris Meredith, who had been the main lady for Charles Starrett in his westerns.
tagline: THE LAW REACHED ONLY AS FAR AS HIS GUNS COULD SHOOT!
title: The Taming of the West
